documents.document: @Seamuscyprien @scrahallia Of course not. But what do you do if lobbying doesn't work in the emerging EU atmosphere. Lobby harder??
@Seamuscyprien @scrahallia Simply lobbying for support is tactic not strategy especially as EU could be transformed by national elections.
@Seamuscyprien @scrahallia None of other 26 have a land border with UK.
@Seamuscyprien @scrahallia Standing back and rolling over doesn't work. Remember ECB's bomb in Dublin. Nothing wrong with demanding place.
@Seamuscyprien @scrahallia Trade negotiations is reserved power of Commission but we should be demanding exception for IR on a/c of border.
If UK has hard #Brexit & sets min corp tax, one of our key FDI benefits disappears unless we can beat UK rate which EU won't allow. #vinb
